sentences.en: Antiseptic is used to sterilize the skin before giving an injection.
sentences.cn: 杀菌剂被用于在注射前给皮肤消毒.

sentences.en: Because of its irritating effect on humans, the use ofphenol as a general antiseptic has been largely discontinued.
sentences.cn: 由于苯酚对人体带有刺激性作用，它基本上已不再被当作常用的防腐剂了。

sentences.en: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.cn: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。
他冷冷地点头打了个招呼.

sentences.en: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.cn: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.en: Put a little antiseptic cream on the grazed skin.
sentences.cn: 在擦伤的皮肤上塗点儿抗菌乳膏.

sentences.en: She bathed the cut with antiseptic.
She gargle with an antiseptic mouthwash.
sentences.cn: 她用具有消毒灭菌作用的漱口剂来清洁口腔.

sentences.en: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.cn: 硫酸铜具有防腐性,这是不曾有过问题的.

sentences.en: The burn of the antiseptic made him wince.
sentences.cn: 消毒剂的刺痛使他连忙缩手.

sentences.en: The nurse painted the wind with antiseptic.
sentences.cn: 护士用抗菌剂涂擦伤口.

sentences.en: The nurse sponged the wound with an antiseptic.
sentences.cn: 护士用纱布蘸了消毒水洗伤口.

sentences.en: The synthetic methed and characterstics of QF 52 - 02 urushiol antiseptic varnish is reported.
sentences.cn: 本文报道了QF52—02漆酚防腐漆的制造方法以及理化性能测试结果.

sentences.en: The technician had on an antiseptic white jacket.
sentences.cn: 那个技术员穿着消毒白色夹克.

sentences.en: These vegetables and herbs have strong antiseptic qualities.
sentences.cn: 这些蔬菜和草本植物有很强的杀菌性。

sentences.en: They're doing tests to evaluate the effectiveness of this herb as an antiseptic.
sentences.cn: 他们正在检测这种草药作为杀菌剂的有效性.

sentences.en: This antiseptic is for external use only.
Thyme tea can be used by adults for its antiseptic qualities.
sentences.cn: 百里香茶的杀菌功效可用于成人。

sentences.en: Turmeric -- the herb that gives a curry its distinctive yellow color -- is also an antiseptic with anti-inflammatory properties.
sentences.cn: 姜黄，就是赋予咖喱那独一无二的黄色的草本植物，同时也是一种能够消炎的杀菌剂。

words.tran_cn: [助剂]防腐的，[药]抗菌的；非常整洁的

trans.tran_cn: 防腐的，无菌的，异常洁净的，诚实无欺的

trans.tran_en: a medicine that you put onto a wound to stop it from becoming infected
